title: Neymar regrets being asked if move about money
description:
(4 Aug 2017) Neymar spoke to the press in the French capital on Friday - the first time since the Brazilian footballer's record-breaking move to Paris St. Germain.
The 25-year-old striker said that he regretted that some people think the move to PSG was only motivated by money. 
He was speaking at the Parc des Princes Stadium, a day after his 222 million-euro (262 million-US dollar) buy-out clause from Barcelona was activated.
